sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167010 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , HSHR_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD , DTY_STRT_DT , DTY_END_DT , RE_STRT_DT , RE_END_DT , RSDT_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_NM , RSPL_NTN_CD , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD , INPM_YN , PRIF_CHNG_YN , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT , SCC_NFP_CNT , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT , WMN_NFP_CNT , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT , DSBR_NFP_CNT , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT , FILE_SBT_YN , FILE_APP_YN , DOC_TYPE , DATA_CD , FORM_CD , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #systemkey# , #clutSeptCd# , #fnm# , #resnoEncCntn# , #tnm# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #hshrClCd# , #rsplNtnInfrNm# , #rsplNtnInfrCd# , #dtyStrtDt# , #dtyEndDt# , #reStrtDt# , #reEndDt# , #rsdtClCd# , #rsplNtnNm# , #rsplNtnCd# , #inctxWhtxTxamtMetnCd# , #inpmYn# , #prifChngYn# , #bscDdcnFpCnt# , #sccNfpCnt# , #chbtAdopNfpCnt# , #wmnNfpCnt# , #snprntNfpCnt# , #dsbrNfpCnt# , #age6ltNfpCnt# , #fileSbtYn# , #fileAppYn# , #docType# , #dataCd# , #formCd# , #issDtSeilNum# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167010 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , FNM=#fnm# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn# , TNM=#tnm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , HSHR_CL_CD=#hshrClCd# , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM=#rsplNtnInfrNm# , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD=#rsplNtnInfrCd# , DTY_STRT_DT=#dtyStrtDt# , DTY_END_DT=#dtyEndDt# , RE_STRT_DT=#reStrtDt# , RE_END_DT=#reEndDt# , RSDT_CL_CD=#rsdtClCd# , RSPL_NTN_NM=#rsplNtnNm# , RSPL_NTN_CD=#rsplNtnCd# , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD=#inctxWhtxTxamtMetnCd# , INPM_YN=#inpmYn# , PRIF_CHNG_YN=#prifChngYn# , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT=#bscDdcnFpCnt# , SCC_NFP_CNT=#sccNfpCnt# , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT=#chbtAdopNfpCnt# , WMN_NFP_CNT=#wmnNfpCnt# , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT=#snprntNfpCnt# , DSBR_NFP_CNT=#dsbrNfpCnt# , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT=#age6ltNfpCnt# , FILE_SBT_YN=#fileSbtYn# , FILE_APP_YN=#fileAppYn# , DOC_TYPE=#docType# , DATA_CD=#dataCd# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM=#issDtSeilNum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , HSHR_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD , DTY_STRT_DT , DTY_END_DT , RE_STRT_DT , RE_END_DT , RSDT_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_NM , RSPL_NTN_CD , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD , INPM_YN , PRIF_CHNG_YN , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT , SCC_NFP_CNT , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT , WMN_NFP_CNT , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT , DSBR_NFP_CNT , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT , FILE_SBT_YN , FILE_APP_YN , DOC_TYPE , DATA_CD , FORM_CD , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , SYSTEMKEY , CLUT_SEPT_CD , FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , TNM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , HSHR_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_INFR_NM , RSPL_NTN_INFR_CD , DTY_STRT_DT , DTY_END_DT , RE_STRT_DT , RE_END_DT , RSDT_CL_CD , RSPL_NTN_NM , RSPL_NTN_CD , INCTX_WHTX_TXAMT_METN_CD , INPM_YN , PRIF_CHNG_YN , BSC_DDCN_FP_CNT , SCC_NFP_CNT , CHBT_ADOP_NFP_CNT , WMN_NFP_CNT , SNPRNT_NFP_CNT , DSBR_NFP_CNT , AGE6LT_NFP_CNT , FILE_SBT_YN , FILE_APP_YN , DOC_TYPE , DATA_CD , FORM_CD , ISS_DT_SEIL_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
